## IWebHidDevice interface

Device object returned by the WebHID consent dialogue

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface IWebHidDevice 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [productId](./jabra-js.iwebhiddevice.productid.md) |  | number | Jabra product ID |
|  [productName](./jabra-js.iwebhiddevice.productname.md) |  | string | Name of the Jabra product |
|  [sessionId](./jabra-js.iwebhiddevice.sessionid.md) |  | string | Unique device ID generated by the browser. Will reset on every refresh |
